akn:subsection.akn:heading: Overall Direction of Executive Branch Policies Relating to Prevention of Conflicts of Interest.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Director shall provide, in consultation with the Office of Personnel Management, overall direction of executive branch policies related to preventing conflicts of interest on the part of officers and employees of any executive agency, as defined in section 105 of this title.
